roleset.name: not related/significant to

example.name: arg1
example.text: Whether your costume involves black face and a noose , or whether it is a grilled sandwich where I think the cheese is a little too drippy is irrelevant .

example.name: both args
example.text: Traditional IQ is irrelevant to learning disabilities--intelligence is not.
